articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Scotland boss Craig Brown’s death aged 82 following a short illness has led to a flood of tributes from around Scottish football and beyond. The ex-Aberdeen and Motherwell manager was the last man to lead the national team to a World Cup and he holds the record for the number of international matches managed by a Scotland coach.
articles.title: Craig Brown: What former players, colleagues and friends said about one of Scottish football's greatest icons

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish football has been paying tribute to one of its most popular, beloved and respected figures Craig Brown following his death on Monday aged 82.
articles.title: Craig Brown: Scotland legend dies aged 82 as tributes flood in for ex-Aberdeen and Motherwell boss

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Celtic forward Robbie Keane has made a surprise managerial move, taking over Israeli giants Maccabi Tel Aviv.
articles.title: Ex-Celtic star in surprise managerial move, Israeli giants, link-up with former Parkhead favourite

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Livingston boss David Martindale has admitted he expects to sell Joel Nouble before the start of the league season.
articles.title: Livingston boss reveals when Joel Nouble could be sold, £1m valuation and why he could play Premier League

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: By the end of the week all 12 Scottish Premiership sides are expected to be back for pre-season before heading off to Europe and beyond for training camps or tours. Managers will be keen to bring in signings across the coming days and weeks.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Serie A side want Celtic ace, Rangers to sign €8m forward, Aberdeen eye 2nd Liverpool deal

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Scottish football can feel far removed from the inner sanctums where the strategic planning happens at the top end across the continent.
articles.title: How Celtic's Peter Lawwell helped save football from Super League - and the growing influence of Rangers at Europe's top table

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: With the new campaign not for away, Celtic and Rangers are ramping up their transfer activity in their bid to become the dominant force in Scottish football next season...
articles.title: Old Firm transfers: Celtic to swoop for striker after Rangers rejection - but £7m forward set for Ibrox 'this week'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: It is not heretical to suggest Celtic supporters could find more favour with the credo expressed by Brendan Rodgers than predecessor Ange Postecoglou over the club’s playing approach in European competition.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers breaks with Ange Postecoglou over Celtic's approach in Europe - 'I won't be averse to a bit of pragmatism'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The transfer window has been open for less than two weeks but cinch Premiership sides have already been active, some more than others. In total 26 signings have been confirmed. Many of the names are familiar to Scottish football fans but there are some who will be new to the game north of the border. The Scotsman looks at some of those newcomers and what we can expect...
articles.title: 5 most interesting Premiership newcomers - Celtic's in-demand star, €9m Rangers striker, Hibs & Aberdeen recruits

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: In Callum McGregor, Celtic are led by a captain easily talented enough to thrive for a top six club in the English Premier League, returning manager Brendan Rodgers has insisted.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers relieved he failed in bid to sign Celtic's Callum McGregor for Leicester

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: In Callum McGregor, Celtic are led by a captain easily talented enough to thrive for a top six club in the English Premier League, returning manager Brendan Rodgers has insisted.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers relieved he failed in bid to sign Celtic's EPL 'top six' performer for Leicester

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish FA chief Ian Maxwell has revealed he was fielding calls from UEFA during the suspension of Scotland’s Euro 2024 qualifier with Georgia on Tuesday night.
articles.title: Scotland v Georgia: Desperation to finish the game revealed, SFA's £1.5m concern, player insurance issue

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scotland will travel to Seville for their Euro 2024 qualifier with Spain later this year, it has been confirmed.
articles.title: Spain v Scotland: Stadium confirmed for 'revenge' Euro 2024 qualifier, Pot 1 importance, Celtic v Porto

articles.author: Chris Andrews
articles.description: Celtic want to be a “world class football club” in whatever they do as new manager Brendan Rodgers has been given the task of continuing to dominate in Scotland.
articles.title: Celtic chief makes 'world class football club' claim and gives Brendan Rodgers 'dominate' aim

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: There is a little known fact that relates to Brendan Rodgers’ first stint at Celtic.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers explains his lack of Celtic apology for Leicester move and points to Kieran Tierney parallel

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: It is just three weeks until the new Scottish football season gets under way with the Viaplay Cup group stages. That leaves clubs plenty of time to get transfer business done.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers ace admission, Celtic close in on highly-rated star, Dundee United duo to exit

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers has delivered a riposte to the Green Brigade over their tweeted objection to his return as Celtic manager.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers breaks silence on Green Brigade tweet as Celtic boss addresses 'fraud' and 'mediocrity' banner

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: There have been few more dynamic illustrations of football’s crazily-paved path than the re-unveiling of a Celtic manager four years after he staged a midnight flit to Leicester City.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers' Celtic return and the missing 12,700 - but no sign of fan protests tells its own story

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: BBC Scotland are in discussions with Celtic after they were banned from attending Brendan Rodgers’ first press conference following his return as manager.
articles.title: BBC Scotland respond after being banned from Brendan Rodgers' Celtic unveiling along with second broadcaster

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers has addressed his acriminous exit from Celtic in 2019 – insisting he regrets the “hurt" it caused but not the decision that he made.
articles.title: 'I don't regret it' - Brendan Rodgers addresses Celtic fan anger in message to 'people who don't want me here'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The SPFL have confirmed more than five million fans attended matches in all competitions last season, setting a new record.
articles.title: The SPFL attendance record revealed as Scotland has highest number of match-going supporters in Europe again

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers will be unveiled to the media this afternoon as he gets to work for his second spell leading the Scottish champions – and he may look to recruit for four different positions.
articles.title: Ex-Celtic star pinpoints the 4 positions Brendan Rodgers may look to strengthen with £30m war chest

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic’s appointment of Brendan Rodgers was to ensure continued domestic dominance rather than for an impact in European football, claims Kris Boyd.
articles.title: Celtic's Brendan Rodgers appointment because of Rangers 'threat' as Kris Boyd makes 'miles off it' Euro claim

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic’s appointment of Brendan Rodgers was to ensure continued domestic dominance rather than for an impact in European football, claims Kris Boyd.
articles.title: Celtic's Brendan Rodgers appointment because of Rangers 'threat' as pundit makes 'miles off it' Euro claim

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scottish Premiership clubs are returning to pre-season and the transfer window has been open for over a week which means there is increased activity as managers look to make additions early ahead of the new campaign.
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers ace wanted, Celtic eye trio plus 12-goal midfielder, Hearts make right-back move

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers sought to park the “nostalgia” of his first spell that yielded two trebles and seven straight trophies as he targeted opening up a new frontier across his second stint at Celtic.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers eyes new Celtic heights as he lifts lid on 'clear change' in recruitment and secret Callum McGregor lunch

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers sought to park the “nostalgia” of his first spell that yielded two trebles and seven straight trophies as he targeted opening up a new frontier across his second stint at Celtic.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers reveals how secret Callum McGregor meeting was key to Celtic return

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Brendan Rodgers will be back in the Celtic dugout next season, four-and-a-half years after leaving the club for Leicester City. In doing so, he will encounter a very different squad and atmosphere to when he was appointed for his first spell in 2016.
articles.title: 5 key Celtic questions for Brendan Rodgers - media unveiling, Rangers challenge, transfer plans

articles.description: Football information site Transfermarkt has updated the market value of 99 players in the Scottish Premiership to formulate an MVP list.
articles.title: Celtic & Rangers values ranked in Premiership MVP list

articles.description: It has been theorised for some time that the Hoops hero has a Twitter account and uses it to defend his record while as manager of the club.
articles.title: Neil Lennon rubbishes Celtic 'burner' account claims

articles.description: The teaser images seem to confirm that the 'snakeskin' pattern will feature on the latest edition of the club's green and white hooped top.

articles.description: The Aussie made the move to the Premier League giants after securing a treble with Celtic last season.

articles.description: The 26-year-old was a bit-part player for Arsenal last term under Mikel Arteta as the Gunners missed out on the Premier League title.

articles.description: Simon Jordan reckons Brendan Rodgers must follow the European standards set by Rangers in recent seasons.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers urged to follow Rangers model in second Celtic stint

articles.description: Melbourne City boss Rado Vidosic has all but confirmed incoming Celtic starlet Marco Tilio's arrival at the Hoops.
articles.title: Marco Tilio to Celtic transfer all but confirmed by manager

articles.description: The Aussie is aiming to put his stamp on Spurs ahead of the new season.
articles.title: Postecoglou and Spurs set for £60m transfer hijack for key target

articles.description: Stephen Welsh is reportedly a transfer target for Hellas Verona with Bologna also moniotoring the central defender.
articles.title: Celtic defender emerges as transfer target for Serie A clubs

articles.description: Yang Hyun-jun has demanded he be allowed to move to Celtic this summer.

articles.description: Back in 2017 the Celtic support believed that Brendan Rodgers walked on water after the former Liverpool manager put himself in the history books by claiming a first-ever Invincible treble immediately after arriving in Glasgow.

articles.description: After guiding Leicester City to a Europa Conference League semi-final last year, Brendan Rodgers now has a taste for success on the European stage.

articles.description: Never mind ten in a row - Neil Lennon believes that Celtic would be attempting to win a 13th consecutive Premiership title next season if it hadn’t been for the coronavirus.

articles.description: After the Aussie's move from Glasgow to London, star duo Kyogo Furuhashi and Reo Hatate have already been heavily linked to Spurs.

articles.description: The Japanese international is a wanted man after a stunning treble-winning campaign for the Hoops.

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers insists James Forrest still has a big future at Celtic, despite game time being limited last term.

articles.description: The Japanese international has been in stunning form since moving to Scotland under Ange Postecoglou in 2021.
articles.title: Burnley eye Kyogo transfer deal amid Ange Postecoglou Spurs link

articles.description: BRENDAN Rodgers has admitted he is relishing the prospect of coming up against Michael Beale next season and predicted the challenge of beating his former colleague’s new-look Rangers team to silverware will bring out the best in him at Celtic.
articles.title: I'll relish playing Michael Beale's new Rangers, says Brendan Rodgers

articles.description: THE heavy defeats his side suffered at the hands of Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain during his first spell in the dugout at Celtic did nothing to convince Brendan Rodgers that he needed to alter his attacking game plan in Europe.

articles.title: Celtic manager on failed Leicester City bid to sign Callum McGregor

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers has signed a three-year deal at Celtic.
articles.title: Reason behind Celtic Brendan Rodgers contract length explained

articles.description: John Hartson has backtracked on his comments suggesting Brendan Rodgers had "made a fool" of him by leaving Celtic for Leicester.

articles.description: The returning Parkhead manager sat down with daily newspapers for a wide-ranging interview.
articles.title: Every word from Brendan Rodgers' gripping Celtic Q&A

articles.description: Rodgers has usually taken charge of clubs at the end of a difficult period, but he believes it is different this time at Celtic.

articles.description: Rodgers’ unveiling as the new Celtic manager back in 2016 was quite something. The scenes as the prodigal son returned were nowhere near as euphoric.

articles.description: BBC Scotland announced on Friday that it had been denied access to Celtic's media event - and the broadcaster was not alone.

articles.description: Tang Hyun-jun's agents have accused his club of moving the goalposts after they blocked his dream move to Celtic.

articles.description: Celtic Park has been rated as the best stadium in Europe in a new report.

articles.title: Celtic star Matt O'Riley shows off abs in lush holiday snaps

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers is reportedly plotting a Celtic K-League raid in the summer.

articles.description: Chris Sutton has slammed the Green Brigade's "petted lip" response to Brendan Rodgers' Celtic return.
